title: The regional "was ist los in deutschland" Thingi
body:
How can I change it back so it shows me the english news again?
I do live in germany but i do not speak german fluently so i need to change it.

replies.body: There should be a region option in the upper right-hand corner under your profile if I'm thinking of the right website. Try changing that, and if you don't see it let me know what page you're on so I can guide you.
